${modID}:ExampleCard.NAME: Name
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: You can put more text in here.
If you need to use it for stuff.
Blizzard is a good example for this.

${modID}:ForgetfulStrike.NAME: Forgetful Strike
${modID}:ForgetfulStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Exhaust a random card in your deck.

${modID}:Nothing.NAME: Sorry Nothing
${modID}:Nothing.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Draw a card.

${modID}:Normalcy.NAME: Normalmancy
${modID}:Normalcy.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL Add a Normality to your hand.

${modID}:Panik.NAME: Panik
${modID}:Panik.DESCRIPTION: At the end of the turn, add !M! Panic Buttons to your draw pile.

${modID}:ThisIsFine.NAME: This is Fine
${modID}:ThisIsFine.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Block for each Burn in your deck. ( !B! Block.) NL Draw a card for each Burn in your hand.

${modID}:RushedStrike.NAME: Rushed Strike
${modID}:RushedStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Only playable in the first !M! seconds of combat.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Only playable in the first !M! seconds of combat. NL (

${modID}:GremlinWheel.NAME: Spin the Wheel!!!
${modID}:GremlinWheel.DESCRIPTION: Spin the Gremlin Wheel. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:FireBreathingOld.NAME: Fire Breathing
${modID}:FireBreathingOld.DESCRIPTION: At the end of the turn, deal 1 damage to ALL enemies for each Attack played this turn.

${modID}:BestOffense.NAME: The Best Offense
${modID}:BestOffense.DESCRIPTION: If the enemy doesn't intend to attack, gain !B! Block.

${modID}:Regretful.NAME: Dark Bargain
${modID}:Regretful.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL At some point, wish you had never played this card.

${modID}:Splash.NAME: Splash
${modID}:Splash.DESCRIPTION: Do nothing. NL Can be upgraded any number of times.

${modID}:YataGarasu.NAME: Yata-Garasu
${modID}:YataGarasu.DESCRIPTION: dumbcards:Banned. NL Deal !D! damage. If the enemy took unblocked damage, Stun it. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:YataGarasu.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: dumbcards:Banned. NL Deal !D! damage. If the enemy took unblocked damage, Stun it.

${modID}:UnlimitedForm.NAME: Unlimited Form(at)
${modID}:UnlimitedForm.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL All dumbcards:Banned and dumbcards:Limited cards can be played.
${modID}:UnlimitedForm.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: All dumbcards:Banned and dumbcards:Limited cards can be played.

${modID}:PotOfGreed.NAME: Pot of Greed
${modID}:PotOfGreed.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: dumbcards:Limited. NL Exhaust the top 10 cards of your Draw Pile. NL Draw 2 cards.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: dumbcards:Banned. NL Exhaust the top 10 cards of your Draw Pile. NL Draw 2 cards.

${modID}:GrandestFinale.NAME: Grandest Finale
${modID}:GrandestFinale.DESCRIPTION: Can only be played if there are no cards in your draw pile, discard pile, or other cards in your hand. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies.
${modID}:GrandestFinale.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Can only be played if there are no cards in your draw pile, discard pile, or other cards in your hand.

${modID}:ChaosEmperorDragon.NAME: Chaos Emperor Dragon
${modID}:ChaosEmperorDragon.DESCRIPTION: dumbcards:Banned. NL Lose 10 HP. NL Exhaust all cards in your hand. NL Deal !D! damage to all enemies for each Exhausted card. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:ChaosEmperorDragon.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: dumbcards:Limited. NL Lose 10 HP. NL Exhaust all cards in your hand. NL Deal !D! damage to all enemies for each Exhausted card. NL Exhaust.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: dumbcards:Banned. NL Lose 10 HP. NL Exhaust all cards in your hand. NL Deal !D! damage to all enemies for each Exhausted card. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:BlastIt.NAME: Sound System
${modID}:BlastIt.DESCRIPTION: Gain 0 - 4 Strength, based on your Master Volume. If you turn down your Volume, lose this Strength.
${modID}:BlastIt.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain 0 - 6 Strength, based on your Master Volume. If you turn down your Volume, lose this Strength.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Gain 0 - 4 Strength, based on your Master Volume. If you turn down your Volume, lose this Strength. NL ( +
